features: ☎️【Answer/Make Calls in One Click】Just connect the smartwatch with your phone via Bluetooth, you can call and answer, view call records on the smartwatch page. Whether you're exercising or driving, your phone can slide onto your smartwatch in time for incoming calls. In addition, you can also through the smart watch control mobile phone to play/pause/switch music, get lost in the music, enjoy a colorful and intelligent life.

⌚【1.7 Inch Large Screen Smart Watch】Smart watch for women men with 1.7 inch Super Retina HD display, 245*285 HD resolution, better color saturation, the picture quality is more delicate and clear, bring you more open visual enjoyment. In Addition, 150+ watch dials can be used, and you can define your own photo album.Be yourself better from a watch.

💕【 Health Management】Fitness watch has a built-in enhanced biosensor chip that integrates optics, structure and algorithm, uses PPG photoelectric sensor principles to monitor accurately. It supports 7*24 hour heart rate monitoring to protect your health. Besides, our smart watch gold also supports blood oxygen and sleep monitoring, which will help you better understand your health on a deep level.

🏃【Your Exclusive Sports Life】Accurately record your daily activities like number of steps, distance, calories burned. It helps you track daily activities with real-time stats on smart watch men and get good fitness effects. Supports multiple sports modes, such as swimming, running, cycling, etc. You can intuitively read your exercise data on the watch. Smart watch for iphone compatible with android 4.4 and above, iOS 8.0 and above smartphone.

🌞【20+ Convenient Functions】Bluetooth calls, music playing, heart rate measurement, blood oxygen measurement, sleep monitor, breathing training, sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder, SMS text or SNS notifications (Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, etc.), games, theater mode, weather forecast, Camera control, alarm clock, waterproof, 8 sports modes, stopwatch, fitness tracker (steps, calories, km) etc. Make your life healthier and your work more efficient.
body.description: MVEFOIT phone watch not only brings you a comfortable wearing experience, but also brings you the ultimate fitness experience◎Receive & Make Calls◎Contact Phone Books◎Receive & Read Message and App Notifications◎AI Voice Control Smartphone◎Heart Rate Monitor/SpO2 Monitor/Sleep Monitor◎Tracks Steps Taken/Calories Burned/GPS Distance Traveled◎8 Sports Modes◎Music Control & Speaker Playback◎Camera Remote Shutter◎Release Stress Games◎Sedentary Reminder◎Relaxation Breathing Training◎Drinking Water Reminder◎Weather Info◎Alarm Clock/Brightness Adjustment/Stop Watch/Find Phone/FlashlightSpecification:Resolution: TFT 240*280Screen: 1.7 inch 3D-gsensor Full Touch ScreenWaterproof: IP68 Life WaterproofBattery Capacity: About 235mAhCharging Time: 1H, 5-7 Days of Use, 10 Days of StandbyCompatible System: Android 4.4+, iOS 8.0+Wristband Size: Length 10 inches,Width 0.7 inchesPackage:1 x Smart Watch/1 x User Manual/1 x Charging Cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking watch!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have to say I did too much research 😂. This watch is a very nice watch. You see the side by side comparison with my Fitbit, which is giving me fits after a year and a half.Pros:For the price you can't go wrong with this watch. It is elegant and light on the waist. It does a whole lot more than my Fitbit. For fitness this is great. Movement reminders, drink water reminders, activity tracker, heart rate, and oxygen levels. It is awesome. (Remember it is not a medical device and not meant to be used as such.) Its activity tracker has many types of activities to track, unlike Fitbit, which only has a few and is supposed to be a activity tracker.It also has a ton of clock faces or you can personalize with your own pictures. Nice feature.I have used the phone feature which worked great. Now when I am not in my car, which connects to my phone, I can answer the phone without having to dig it out of my pocket or purse. Nice and in a reasonably inexpensive watch.It does have 24 hour service on the app, which I have used to ask questions. They answered in a timely fashion.Also, the player feature worked well, as it can control the player in your phone and you can listen while you exercise without having to have your phone out. The shutter worked well for controlling the camera on the phone. It is a nice feature for my selfies or group pics I want to be in.Cons:The first one is the app, as stated in other reviews it is glitchy. It may come on when needed or not. It sometimes will not keep the settings you want as in metric or imperial measures. I keep that monitored. They really do need to work on that with such a nice watch.Also, sleep function cannot be turn to any other time. It is 10-8. If you work third shifts or even second shifts you will not be able to track your sleep. If not important this is not a deal breaker.I will update if I find anything else I like or dislike. Also on the longevity of the watch. I am looking forward to using this watch over my other one.UPDATE:The battery life is as long as my Versa ever was. Depending if I leave the phone on on my watch, it will last about 3 days. If I turn off the phone and turn on battery saver (nice feature) it can last 4-6 days. Honestly this is not a problem I plug my phone in every night and I don't wear the watch 24/7. As mentioned in another review every once in a while the app gets glitchy. Hopefully they will fix that with updates. Only happened a couple of times.I love this watch! I am buying one for my husband for Christmas. The watch band fits him! He has big wrists! 😂Update: The only issues I have had with the watch is it will switch screens easily while wearing. I may be wearing it too close to my hand. The other thing I have encountered is the time being off. I had to re-pair the watch. This is an app thing. It only happened once while traveling. I do not consider these to be something that would keep me from buying the watch. As a matter of fact I did get one for my husband. If it lasts a year it will have lasted longer than my Fitbit. Worth it to me. Not spending a fortune either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I liked how you can read the text messages on the watch, you can call. It gives you notifications. You can play a game on there which is really fun! It was all such a great experience and just in case if I lose it I can go on the app and search for my device. My watch lasts up for a week until I have to charge it again. It's really easy to use all you need is the app on your phone it's easy to set up and sync.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. I also had IMMEDIATE HELP with all my questions.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality watch. Keeps accurate track of my steps and walking, I can make and receive my phone calls on it, and I can even receive text my text messages on it.There is so much more on this smart watch that I’m still learning…. Such as sleep and calming meditative breathing. Plenty of watch faces to choose from. But what is really important to me is that I was able to receive IMMEDIATE personal help twice tonight and she was patient and completely resolved my issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was surprisingly happy
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch after looking at others and compared to the expensive brand names this one is actually money worth spent. It does take and make calls, you can also read all your incoming messages, but you can't text back, but with most it's pretty standard. I love the heart rate high warning. I also love the tracking ability and also love how easy it was to set up and connect. Compared to others I highly suggest this one. It does the basics you need at an affordable cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A little misleading
reviews.reviewText: This is not a Smart Watch that you would talk through or reply to texts with. Basically, all the call/text/a.i. features do is wake your phone. Not sure there is even a microphone in this thing. Incoming calls light up the watch and if you press the answer button, it just opens your phone. You can dial a number out on the watch but touching the "call" button just opens the phone to make the call. The A.I. "assist to reply to text messages" button only opens the voice assist on your phone.This is to be expected with the low price.However, more basic functions are lacking. Alarms can only be set in the app, are vibration only, limited to 3 and the slightest movement of the watch turns it off - which is not very useful if you are wearing this alarm to wake from sleep. No calculator. Camera shutter will not work with all phones. Music player control will not pull titles or thumbnails from phone. No sound customization, hardly any sound at all. The "Find my device" alert is quiet.The only positive I have for this watch is that it has many more face options available for free through the app compared to the other 3 I bought for the same price.This watch is cluttered with useless features and even less useful without the app handy. It works well as a light-up digital watch but that's about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This item in the description states that it has AI control for Call/text but doesn't
reviews.reviewText: Can't text others using AI I searched for a smart watch that allowed calls and texting via Bluetooth control using AI voice commands to do it and even paid more money in order to get both and after receiving the item can make and receive calls and receive texts and notifications but can't send texts ...I was hoping that I ordered a smart watch that allowed that but it doesn't allow sending texts , I spent about $10 or more for this item believing that it allowed sending and receiving texts as well as calling and receiving calls and all the rest with allowing music from cellular device and all the health monitoring which is not really needed but to receive a smart watch without most of the applications to do with steps and heart bpm and temperature and all and to have the ability to add and remove apps based on your preferences you will need to buy a smart watch that has a cellular plan and have a Sim card and SD card either built in or that has slots for these to be added , which I believe the closest one is the Samsung smart watch that has a cellular plan that is like a cellular device on your wrist without the need to Bluetooth from a device... I gave this item to my girlfriend because of the lack of being able to text and receive texts like the calls...
O relógio foi dado com presente e a pessoa agraciada está muito satisfeíta.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only received the watch yesterday, via Amazon. All looks good so far. Able to receive text / WhatsApp notification messages when I can't have my phone out of my pocket or bag. Display is clear, you can actually read the full message, unlike other watches that just show the first few lines. Doesn't show emojis but it's not a problem. I would recommend this watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 22, 2022
